title: Gurbanguly Berdimuhamedow
summary: Gurbanguly Mälikgulyýewiç Berdimuhamedow[lower-alpha 1][lower-alpha 2] (Turkmen pronunciation: [ɢʊɾbɑnʁʊˈlɯ mælɪk'ɢʊlɯjɛβɪtʃ bɛɾdɯmʊxɑmɛˈdoβ]; born 29 June 1957)[12] is a Turkmen politician who has been serving as the president of Turkmenistan since February 2007.
